spec_data.Name: perl-Gtk3
spec_data.Description:
The Gtk3 module allows a Perl developer to use the GTK+ graphical user
interface library. Find out more about GTK+ at <http://www.gtk.org/>.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 10 Aug 2017 10:44:19 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl interface to the 3.x series of the GTK+ toolkit
